chapter.title: ARAnyM developers mailing list
chapter.text:
This list is intended for developers of ARAnyM. User questions or problems should NOT be posted here.
The WWW interface for subscribing to the developer mailing list or browsing through the mail archive is available here.

chapter.title: ARAnyM users mailing list
chapter.text:
This list is open to all ARAnyM users. Questions, problems, bug reports or ARAnyM success stories should be posted here.
The WWW interface for subscribing to the user mailing list or browsing through the mail archive is available here.
